channel.title: Tayler Geiger
channel.description: Portfolio and blog of a writer and developer.

item.title: First
item.dc:creator: Tayler Geiger
item.description: This is a test post as I work on transferring (well, actually completely replacing) my old Jekyll site to the Nikola Python framework. Jekyll was working really well for me—as well as it could given that I barely did anything with the site—but I wanted to use a Python framework so I could mess with the innards if I wanted. Soon, I will get some professional docs up here, like my resume and some projects, maybe.
